thread.section_title: Celebrity Style, Fashion, Beauty, and Red Carpet | PEOPLE
thread.title: Best Celebrity Engagement Rings

author: Alex Apatoff
title: Best Celebrity Engagement Rings

persons.name: keisha knight pullman/instagram  keshia knight pulliam

organizations.name: tory burch instagram tory burch & pierre-yves rossel

text:
The 59-year-old supermodel sports a gigantic ring from her 89-year-old billionaire fiancé. 31 of 54 AP (2) MARK BALLAS & BC JEAN 
The oversized oval-shaped diamond flanked by two baguettes that the Dancing With the Stars pro gave his singer love is so shiny, it practically outshines the Mirrorball Trophy. 32 of 54 Mark Von Holden/Variety/REX/Shutterstock; Inset: Wilfredo Rosado 
MARIAH CAREY & JAMES PACKER 
The diva received a 35-carat, Wilfredo Rosado-designed stunner from her billionaire beau. "It's an epic ring for an epic time in her life," the designer told Vogue in January. (By their November split, it was also at the center of one very important controversy: Would she get to keep the ring ?) 33 of 54 Jodie Sweetin/Instagram; Inset: WireImage JODIE SWEETIN & JUSTIN HODAK 
“I'm so happy and he did a GREAT job with the ring!” the Fuller House star wrote on Instagram of her double halo-set, split-shank ring. 34 of 54 TC/Splash News Online LOUISE ROE & MACKENZIE HUNKIN 
The style star got a classic-with-a-twist sparkler from her TV director love – an oval diamond with two halos of smaller diamonds, all set in yellow gold. 35 of 54 Startraks; Inset: Courtesy Neil Lane ROSIE HUNTINGTON-WHITELEY & JASON STATHAM 
“ Jason wanted something perfect and flawless and he kept coming back to this one,” Neil Lane tells People of the Edwardian-set stone from the jeweler's archival collection that the action star gave his supermodel bride-to-be. 36 of 54 D Dipasupil/Getty; Inset: AKM-GSI EVA LONGORIA & JOSE ANTONIO BASTON 
The bride-to-be looked ecstatic to show off her ruby-and-diamond sparkler from her TV exec boyfriend on The Today Show – even more so because she chose a pair of ruby-and-diamond earrings to match! 37 of 54 Seth Browarnik/Startraks; Inset:Neil Lane RYAN PHILLIPPE & PAULINA SLAGTER 
The actor and his Stanford law student girlfriend made sure to ring in the new year with this Neil Lane stunner , consisting of 185 round diamonds. 38 of 54 Skylar Astin/Instagram ANNA CAMP & SKYLAR AUSTIN 
When the two stars of your favorite acapella movie decided to get hitched , you just knew the ring was going to be (wait for it) Pitch Perfect. 39 of 54 Source: Tory Burch Instagram TORY BURCH & PIERRE-YVES ROSSEL 
The fashion designer's ring from her french fashion exec beau can probably be seen from outer space. 40 of 54 Keisha Knight Pullman/Instagram 
KESHIA KNIGHT PULLIAM & ED HARTWELL 
The Cosby Show's massive square-cut rock from the former NFL player is just one of the reasons she declared herself #blessedbeyondmeasure at Christmas 2015. (The couple have wed, announced their pregnancy and filed for divorce since.) 41 of 54 JULIA STILES & PRESTON J. COOK 
We bet the actress found 10 Things to Love About her sweet round-cut solitaire bezel-set in yellow gold, given to her by her camera assistant love in Colombia . 42 of 54 Tara Lipinkski/Instagram TARA LIPINSKI & TODD KAPOSTASY 
“ My life changed forever last night,” Lipinski wrote of receiving her oval-shape stunner from her Fox Sports producer beau. 43 of 54 Splash News Online; Inset: Sipa GRACE GEALEY & TRAI BYERS 
Can you imagine the Empire engagement party that happened when Trai popped the question to his costar Grace with this square-cut, halo-set diamond ring ?! 44 of 54 Jack Plunkett/Invision/AP LIV TYLER & DAVE GARDNER 
She's been sporting her romantic, emerald-cut sparkler with a delicate band on that finger for months, but just confirmed that she and love Dave Gardner are set to wed . 45 of 54 Courtesy Julianne Hough JULIANNE HOUGH & BROOKS LAICH 
After accidentally flashing a glimpse of her huge Lorraine Schwartz ring on Instagram, the star did the official reveal on her blog . “[It] takes my breath away every time I look down,” she wrote of the gift from her hockey player fiancé. 46 of 54 Getty (2) EMMY ROSSUM & SAM ESMAIL 
It makes sense that the girl whose style is always simply chic would get a ring to match: a round diamond flanked by two baguettes , given to her by her Mr. Robot creator love of several years. 47 of 54 Splash News Online (2) ALISON BRIE & DAVE FRANCO 
It makes sense that two gorgeous, quirky actors would pick a gorgeous, one-of-a-kind ring to pledge their betrothal: Alison debuted her rose-gold, rose-cut diamond Irene Neuwirth ring on on the red carpet in August. 48 of 54 Courtesy Lady Gaga; Inset: Getty 
LADY GAGA & TAYLOR KINNEY 
Amazingly, the heart-shaped diamond on her Lorraine Schwartz engagement ring from her actor love isn't the most interesting part of Gaga's engagement ring. The diamond-studded band features a sweet message: T (HEARTS) S (her given name is Stefani). The couple split in July 2016 but remain friends. 49 of 54 Startraks; Inset: iPhoto NIKKI REED & IAN SOMERHALDER 
“ It’s so gorgeous, and I’m very lucky for many reasons, but I look at it every day and just think, Wow. I don’t even know what to say,” Nikki told PEOPLE about her floral-style engagement ring from Ian Somerhalder, consisting of one center stone flanked by 10 smaller ones. 50 of 54 Abaca (2) KIM SEARS & ANDY MURRAY 
It was “love all” when the tennis pro served up an ace (okay, we're done with the tennis puns) of an engagement ring for his longtime girlfriend : a round stone surrounded by a halo of diamonds that continued onto the band. 51 of 54 Splash News Online; Inset: Startraks 
JAIMIE ALEXANDER & PETER FACINELLI 
Everything about the actress's engagement to her actor beau was traditional, from her large halo-set ring to the on-one-knee proposal, though it took a little effort: “I had just bought these new jeans and they were a little tight,” Peter joked to PEOPLE at the time. “So I said, 'My jeans are tight but I’ll try to get down on one knee.'” (The couple ended their engagement in February 2016.) 52 of 54 Getty; Inset: Courtesy Jacob of Beverly Hills 
IGGY AZALEA & NICK YOUNG 
Yes, it's a “Fancy” yellow diamond – and one that took a lot of effort before it reached the rapper's finger. Her NBA star boyfriend designed the 10.43-carat ring , consisting of an 8.15-carat intense yellow diamond and a white diamond halo set into white gold, with jeweler Jason Arasheben of Jason of Beverly Hills. (Their engagement ended in June 2016.) 53 of 54 Splash News Online; Inset: WireImage MAGGIE Q & DYLAN MCDERMOTT 
She met him on the set of their CBS crime drama Stalker , but it wasn't much of a mystery as to how he felt about her when she showed off this massive sqauare-cut stunner on a baguette-set band. 54 of 54 Getty; Inset: WireImage ALEXIS BLEDEL & VINCENT KARTHEISER 
For the couple that met on the set of Mad Men, a gorgeous and unique sparkler worthy of that show's killer costuming was the only thing that would do. And the octagonal stone set on a vintage-inspired band was certainly that. See Also
